Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: 3D container packing application

This is a 3D container loading/packing visualization application built with React, Three.js, and TypeScript. Features include:
- Interactive 3D visualization of container packing
- Multiple packing algorithms (First Fit, Best Fit, Custom)
- Real-time space utilization statistics
- Box management and visualization

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
